Interface ClusterDictionary

public interface ClusterDictionary

An interface for the access of Clusters.

0.8
Author:

Method Detail

getClustersMatching

java.util.List<? extends Cluster> getClustersMatching(java.lang.String domainRegex)
Retrieves all Clusters having names matching domainRegex. Implementing classes should define which kind of regular expressions are allowed. If no wildcards are used, the method retrieves Clusters with the exact domain name domainRegex. The matching should not be case sensitive.

Parameters:
domainRegex - a plain String or a regular expression to match against domain names
Returns:
a List of Clusters matching domainRegex, or an empty List if nothing is found.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param is null.

getClusterById

Cluster getClusterById(java.lang.Long id)
Returns the Cluster with the unique id.

Parameters:
id - the id of a Cluster
Returns:
a Cluster, returns null if a Cluster with id does not exist.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param is null.

getAllClusterNames

java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllClusterNames()
Retrieves all Cluster names (domain names) from the MerkOr data.

Returns:
a List of Cluster names
